akn:section.akn:heading: Reports on activities and assistance under Department of Defense Cooperative Threat Reduction Progra

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Annual report In any year in which the President submits to Congress, under section 1105 of title 31, the budget for a fiscal year that requests funds for the Department of Defense for activities or assistance under the Program, the Secretary of Defense, after consultation with the Secretary of State, shall submit to the congressional defense committees, the Committee on Foreign Affairs of the House of Representatives, and the Committee on Foreign Relations of the Senate a report on the activities and assistance carried out under the Program.
(b) Deadline Each report under subsection (a) shall be submitted not later than the first Monday in February of a year.
(c) Matters included Each report under subsection (a) shall include the following:
(d) Termination date The requirement to submit the report under subsection (a) shall terminate on January 1, 2030.
